Can you use cup holders for soundproof?
In: Lifestyle › Home&Garden
Rate This Answer
Yes, you can use the cardboard molded cup holders that you get at fast food restaurants for soundproofing a room. To use them, simply staple or tape the cup holders to the wall for soundproofing. You can also use egg cartons Answered
